医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
万斯-沃尔兹辩论凸显了明显的卫生政策差异俄亥俄州共和党参议员 JD Vance 和明尼苏达州民主党州长蒂姆·沃尔兹 (Tim Walz) 在哥伦比亚广播公司新闻 (CBS News) 主办的 10 月 1 日副总统辩论中会面，辩论气氛热烈，重点讨论了政策问题 — 与 9 月 10 日副总统卡马拉·哈里斯 (Kamala Harris) 和副总统卡马拉·哈里斯 (Kamala Harris) 之间的辩论相比，这是一个显着的变化。前总统唐纳德·特朗普。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241002/Vance-Walz-debate-highlighted-clear-health-policy-differences.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241002/Vance-Walz-debate-highlighted-clear-health-policy-differences.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50cd5a51-6792-4ff2-8c42-e5fbd3641b11 Wed, 02 Oct 2024 21:15:17 -0400 Vance-Walz debate highlighted clear health policy differences
哈里斯对孕产妇保健的重视正在为黑人女性选民带来回报副总统卡玛拉·哈里斯得到了黑人女性选民的大力支持，部分原因是她在孕产妇死亡率、生殖权利和枪支管制等医疗保健问题上所做的工作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241002/Harrise28099-emphasis-on-maternal-health-care-is-paying-dividends-with-Black-women-voters.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241002/Harrise28099-emphasis-on-maternal-health-care-is-paying-dividends-with-Black-women-voters.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a5a17f27-ed27-479d-b69e-cf058f919ef7 Wed, 02 Oct 2024 21:05:56 -0400 Harris’ emphasis on maternal health care is paying dividends with Black women voters
由于风险效益担忧，绝经后激素治疗的使用减少一项研究显示，美国女性更年期激素治疗的使用急剧下降，凸显了二十年来不同种族和民族之间的差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241002/Postmenopausal-hormone-therapy-use-declines-amid-risk-benefit-concerns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241002/Postmenopausal-hormone-therapy-use-declines-amid-risk-benefit-concerns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b2e5356-b9d7-46d1-8d2b​​-587cfa9da6f5 Wed, 02 Oct 2024 04:43:00 -0400 Postmenopausal hormone therapy use declines amidst risk-benefit concerns
植物多酚：长寿和健康老龄化的秘诀？植物多酚在抗衰老、支持线粒体健康和减少炎症方面具有前景，有可能改善老年人的生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241002/Plant-polyphens-The-secret-to-living-longer-and-healthy-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241002/Plant-polyphens-The-secret-to-living-longer-and-healthy-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e34ba39-5786-4826-a554-f7650dad5efb Wed, 02 Oct 2024 04:08:00 -0400 Plant polyphenols: The secret to living longer and healthy aging?
科学家利用实验室培养的肠道发现了两种克罗恩病亚型，为个性化治疗带来了希望研究人员使用来自克罗恩病患者的干细胞衍生的类器官来识别两种分子亚型，为针对特定疾病特征的个性化治疗铺平了道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241002/Scientists-uncover-two-Crohne28099s-disease-subtypes-using-lab-grown-intestines-offering-hope-for-personalized-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241002/Scientists-uncover-two-Crohne28099s-disease-subtypes-using-lab-grown-intestines-offering-hope-for-personalized-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80c9c141-6fef-4b6d-8bee-27abf000edad Wed, 02 Oct 2024 01:07:00 -0400 Scientists uncover two Crohn’s disease subtypes using lab-grown intestines, offering hope for personalized therapies
接种新冠病毒 mRNA 疫苗后，长寿命浆细胞无法建立，限制了长期抗体反应研究人员发现，在 mRNA 疫苗接种后，SARS-CoV-2 特异性浆细胞很大程度上被排除在骨髓中的长寿命浆细胞室之外，这解释了短暂的抗体反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241002/Long-lived-plasma-cells-fail-to-built-after-COVID-mRNA-vaccination-limiting-long-term-antibody-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241002/Long-lived-plasma-cells-fail-to-built-after-COVID-mRNA-vaccination-limiting-long-term-antibody-response.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a9d9fce-2553-452d-98fc-45998d6e91c4 Wed, 02 Oct 2024 00:30:00 -0400 Long-lived plasma cells fail to establish after COVID mRNA vaccination, limiting long-term antibody response
科学家推出 3D 光声扫描仪，可加速血管成像以供实时临床使用研究人员开发了一种用于高分辨率血管成像的快速 3D 光声断层扫描 (PAT) 扫描仪，能够快速、详细地显示微血管系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Scientists-unveil-a-3D-photoacoustic-scanner-that-speeds-up-angio-imaging-for-real-time-clinical-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Scientists-unveil-a-3D-photoacoustic-scanner-that-speeds-up-angio-imaging-for-real-time-clinical-use.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b8883b4-5a32-45fc-aa8f-c9e157be27f5 Tue, 01 Oct 2024 23:50:00 -0400 Scientists unveil a 3D photoacoustic scanner that speeds up vascular imaging for real-time clinical use
研究显示 CheekAge 可以准确预测死亡风险我们的衰老速度并不相同。然而，虽然一些超级百岁老人可能因为赢得了基因大奖而衰老得异常缓慢，但众所周知，大量的行为和生活方式因素会加速衰老，包括压力、睡眠质量差、营养不良、吸烟和酗酒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/CheekAge-can-accurately-predict-the-risk-of-mortality-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/CheekAge-can-accurately-predict-the-risk-of-mortality-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=827bab15-b4ea-4ef4-a6e0-918c950478fb Tue, 01 Oct 2024 23:10:39 -0400 CheekAge can accurately predict the risk of mortality, study shows
长期新冠肺炎影响了 38% 症状持续的急诊患者研究人员发现，急诊室的大量 SARS-CoV-2 阳性和阴性患者均持续存在 COVID-19 后病症 (PCC) 症状，这突显了 WHO PCC 标准的非特异性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Long-COVID-affects-3825-of-emergency-病人-with-persistent-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Long-COVID-affects-3825-of-emergency-病人-with-persistent-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=908cfc2f-8b5c-41b9-adab-3fb5c877c408 Tue, 01 Oct 2024 23:09:00 -0400 Long COVID affects 38% of emergency patients with persistent symptoms
研究预示着基因测序和测试的新时代伦敦玛丽女王大学科学家领导的研究预示着基因测序和测试的新时代的到来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Research-heralds-in-a-new-era-for-genic-sequencing-and-testing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Research-heralds-in-a-new-era-for-genic-sequencing-and-testing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=254202cc-e864-4e25-92fa-561a9da10444 Tue, 01 Oct 2024 23:03:04 -0400 Research heralds in a new era for genetic sequencing and testing
